name: jasperroel.github.com
body:
### Welcome to My Page.

Check out my first open source project **Java Chatter REST API** @ https://github.com/forcedotcom/JavaChatterRESTApi. It is a nice very easy-to-use wrapper around the REST API provided by Chatter.

I've also contributed to several open source project, which started a long time ago with a bug fix in Asterisk, the open source telephone system (I have no idea how I found the bug). Contributed a bit to the great open source Content Management System called OpenCms (https://github.com/alkacon/opencms-core).

You can find more professional data @ LinkedIn, http://www.linkedin.com/in/jasperroel/.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
